statements: SELECT * FROM feedbacks
SELECT feedback_id, student_name, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT student_name, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE country IN ('USA', 'Canada', 'UK') ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedbacks
SELECT * FROM feedbacks ORDER BY timestamp DESC, rating ASC, student_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT feedback_id, student_name, country, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE country='USA' AND rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT student_id, student_name, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE country='Canada' AND rating < 4 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT student_id, student_name, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE rating >= 3 AND rating <= 5 AND country='Mexico' ORDER BY rating ASC, student_id ASC
SELECT * FROM feedback_table;
SELECT student_name, country FROM feedback_table WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT feedback FROM feedback_table WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM evaluation_table ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_score FROM evaluation_table WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT student_name, feedback FROM feedback_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedback_table;
SELECT feedback_table.student_name, evaluation_table.evaluation_score FROM feedback_table INNER JOIN evaluation_table ON feedback_table.id = evaluation_table.feedback_id;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(id) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedback_table GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM evaluation WHERE evaluation_score > 8;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id > 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(evaluation_id) AS num_evaluations FROM feedback LEFT JOIN evaluation ON feedback.feedback_id = evaluation.feedback_id GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING num_evaluations > 5;

SELECT feedback.feedback_id, international_student.student_name, evaluation.evaluation_score FROM feedback JOIN evaluation ON feedback.feedback_id = evaluation.feedback_id JOIN international_student ON feedback.international_student_id = international_student.international_student_id;

SELECT international_student.student_name, international_student.country, feedback.feedback_text FROM international_student JOIN feedback ON international_student.international_student_id = feedback.international_student_id WHERE international_student.country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT student_id, name, country FROM student ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT * FROM evaluation WHERE evaluation_text LIKE '%good%';
SELECT service_name, rating_average FROM service_quality ORDER BY rating_average DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, country FROM student WHERE language = 'English' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT evaluation_text, timestamp FROM evaluation WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT service_name, rating_average FROM service_quality WHERE total_feedbacks > 100 ORDER BY rating_average DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT student_id, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT name, country FROM students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM evaluations WHERE rating <= 2;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks ORDER BY rating DESC, id ASC
SELECT student_id, name, country FROM students WHERE country='USA'
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT teacher_name, country FROM teachers WHERE country='UK' ORDER BY teacher_name ASC
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE rating >= 4
